name: Spacescape (itch) (UltiGames)
description:
Gameplay

Spacescape is a science fantasy open world game set on a mysterious alien world where science fiction meets the medieval. The Player is cast as a nomadic explorer native to one of the villages, set out on a quest to uncover the secrets of the mysterious technology across the planet – and why visitors from space are so intent on taking it for themselves.

Plot

The story of Spacescape follows a young adventurer from one of the many tribal villages around the planet. Despite the medieval culture that they hail from, the world is filled with ancient technological marvels of unknown origin, but nobody has been able to explore them due to the legions of killer robots that guard them. The player decides that they will be the first to survive and the explore these sites, and become a legend.

However, things are not so simple. Civilisations from other worlds have heard of this strange alien planet, bringing their ships and armies to colonize and conquer it. Their ships shot down in orbit by the towers, these invaders now threaten the safety of everyone.

Controls

Spacescape is a level demo, with minimal gameplay except for camera controls.

Movement [WASD]

Ascend [SPACE]

Descend [CTRL]

Boost [SHIFT]

Interact [E]

Credits Development

Developed by Ulti
